Html:
I am not receiving emails

The log says this

220 localhost smtp4dev ready
EHLO Studio-17
250-Nice to meet you.
250-8BITMIME
250-STARTTLS
250-AUTH=CRAM-MD5 PLAIN LOGIN ANONYMOUS
250-AUTH CRAM-MD5 PLAIN LOGIN ANONYMOUS
250 SIZE
MAIL FROM:<xxxxxxxxx>
250 Okey dokey
RCPT TO:<xxxxxxxx>
250 Recipient accepted
RSET

xxxxxxx are blanked out good emails

Is this log indicating that the email was sent successfully?
